Title: Mary Poppins
Overview: Mr Banks is looking for a nanny for his two mischievous children and comes across Mary Poppins, an angelic nanny. She not only brings a change in their lives but also spreads happiness.
Keywords: london england, dancing, parents kids relationship, bank, brother sister relationship, famous score, confidence, nanny, laughing, magic, chimney sweeper, musical, live action and animation
Cast: Julie Andrews, Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson
